back_text: The lead investigator must decide (choose one): Either each investigator discards 1 card at random from his or her hand, or the lead investigator takes 2 horror.
name: 무슨 일이야?!

back_text: - If the investigators are at Act 1 or 2, they are trapped inside the house as the ghouls tear them apart. (→R3) - If the investigators are at Act 3, they barely escape with their lives, allowing the ghouls to run rampant. Each investigator that has not resigned is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma.
name: 구울들이 뛰쳐나간다!
text: Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Each unengaged [[Ghoul]] enemy moves 1 location towards the Parlor. Forced - At the end of the round: Place 1 doom on this agenda for each [[Ghoul]] enemy in the Hallway or Parlor.

back_text: The lead investigator must decide (choose one): - It was never much of a home. Burn it down! (→R1) - This hell-pit is my home! No way are we burning it! (→R2)
name: 대체 무슨 짓이야?
text: Objective - If the Ghoul Priest is Defeated, advance.

name: 리타 챈들러
text:
당신이 ‘리타 챈들러’를 조종하는 동안, ‘리타 챈들러’는 다음 기능을 획득합니다:
“당신이 위치한 장소의 모든 조사자는 +1 [combat]을 얻습니다.
[reaction] 당신이 위치한 장소에 있는 조사자 한 명이 [[괴물]] 적 하나를 성공적으로 공격할 때: 그 조사자는 피해를 +1 줍니다.”

name: 식인귀
text: Spawn - Attic.

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: -X. 플레이 상태인 모든 파멸의 개수가 X 값입니다.
[cultist]: -2. 플레이 상태인 모든 [[추종자]] 적에게 파멸을 1개씩 올려놓습니다. 플레이 상태인 [[추종자]] 적이 없다면, 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다.
[tablet]: -4. 실패하면, 당신이 가진 모든 단서를 당신이 위치한 장소에 올려 놓습니다.
name: 한밤의 가면
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: -X. 플레이 상태인[[추종자]] 적 중에서, 파멸을 가장 많이 가진 [[추종자]] 적의 파멸 개수가 X 값입니다.
[cultist]: -2. 가장 가까운 [[추종자]] 적에게 파멸을 1개 올려놓습니다.
[tablet]: -3. 실패하면, 당신이 가진 단서 1개를 당신이 위치한 장소에 올려 놓습니다.

name: 음모를 밝혀내다
text: [action] The investigators spend 2 clues per investigator, as a group: Draw the top card of the Cultist deck. Objective - Find as many unique [[Cultist]] enemies as you can and add them to the victory display. If there are 6 unique [[Cultist]] enemies in the victory display, advance. (Note: Not all 6 of them are in the Cultist deck.)

name: 묘지
text: Forced - After you enter the Graveyard: Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, you must either take 2 horror or move to Rivertown.

name: “늑대인간” 드류
text: Spawn - Downtown. Forced - When "Wolf-Man" Drew attacks: Heal 1 damage from him.

name: 헤르만 콜린스
text: Spawn - Graveyard. [action] Choose and discard 4 cards from your hand: Parley. Add Herman Collins to the victory display.

back_text: In player order, each investigator must test [willpower] (6). Each investigator who fails must search his or her collection for a random basic [[Madness]] weakness and add it to his or her hand.
name: 의식이 시작되다
text: Each enemy gets +1 fight and +1 evade.

name: 의식 방해
text: [action] Spend 1 clue: Test [willpower] (3) or [agility] (3). If you succeed, place 1 clue on this Act. Objective - If there are 2 clues per investigator on this Act, advance.

name: 아컴의 숲
text: Forced - When you move out of this location: Test [intellect] (3). If you fail, cancel the effects of the move.

name: 공포에 얼어붙다
text: Revelation - Put Frozen in Fear into play in your threat area. The first time you perform one of the following actions (move, fight, or evade) each round, it costs 1 additional action. Forced - At the end of your turn: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Frozen in Fear.

name: 으스스한 한기
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, choose and discard 1 asset you control (if you cannot, take 2 damage instead).

name: 자욱한 안개
text: Revelation - Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. Attached location gets +2 shroud. Forced - After attached location is successfully investigated: Discard Obscuring Fog.

name: 사교도 시종
text: Spawn - Any empty location. Forced - After Acolyte enters play: Place 1 doom on it.

name: 기이한 주문
text: Revelation - Place 2 doom on the nearest [[Cultist]] enemy. If there are no [[Cultist]] enemies in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Cultist]] enemy and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: 추적해오는 나이트건트
text:
Hunter.
While attempting to evade Hunting Nightgaunt, double the negative modifier of each revealed chaos token.

name: 어둠의 날개에서
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (4). If you fail, take 1 horror and 1 damage. Then, disengage with each non-[[Nightgaunt]] enemy engaged with you and move to a [[Central]] location.

name: 잠긴 문
text: Revelation - Attach to the location in play with the most clues, and without a Locked Door attached. The attached location cannot be investigated. [action]: Test [combat] (4) to break down the door or [agility] (4) to pick the lock. If you succeed, discard Locked Door.

name: 황색의 표식
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, take 2 horror and search your deck for a [[Madness]] weakness. Draw that card and shuffle your deck.

name: 이스인 관찰자
text: Prey - Fewest cards in hand. Forced - When Yithian Observer attacks you: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. If you cannot, Yithian Observer deals +1 damage and +1 horror for this attack.

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: -1 플레이 상태인 장소 중에서, 그 밑에 조우 카드가 없는 장소마다 -1.
[cultist]: -4. 실패하면, 토큰 저장소에서 단서를 1개 가져와 당신이 위치한 장소에 올려놓습니다.
[tablet]: -3. 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다.
[elder_thing]: -3. 현재 주요사건에 파멸을 1개 올려놓습니다.
name: 제단에 흘린 피
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: 플레이 상태인 장소 중에서, 그 밑에 조우 카드가 없는 장소마다 -1(최대 -4).
[cultist]: -2. 실패하면, 토큰 저장소에서 단서를 1개 가져와 당신이 위치한 장소에 올려놓습니다.
[tablet]: -2. 당신이 ‘숨겨진 방’에 있으면, 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다.
[elder_thing]: -3. 실패하면, 현재 주요사건에 파멸을 1개 올려놓습니다.

name: 방 열쇠
text: Revelation - Take control of Key to the Chamber. [free] If The Hidden Chamber is connected to your location: Attach Key to the Chamber to The Hidden Chamber.

name: 지블런 웨이틀리
text:
당신은 +1 [willpower]를 얻습니다.
[reaction] 당신이 음모 카드에 있는 [willpower] 테스트에 성공한 후, ‘지블런 웨이틀리’를 소진합니다: 카드를 1장 뽑습니다.

name: 납치당하다!
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4) or [agility] (4). If you fail, add an [[Ally]] asset you control to the pool of potential sacrifices. Then, attach Kidnapped! to the current agenda. If you have no [[Ally]] assets, take 2 damage and discard Kidnapped! instead. Forced - When attached agenda advances: Choose a potential sacrifice at random and place it underneath the agenda deck.

name: 저승사자의 노래
text: Surge. Peril. Revelation - Add Psychopomp's Song to any investigator's threat area. Forced - When you would take 1 or more damage: Take 2 additional damage and discard Psychopomp's Song.

name: 헨리 아미티지 박사
text: [reaction] 당신이 약점이 아닌 카드를 1장 뽑은 후, 그 카드를 버리고 ‘헨리 아미티지 박사’를 소진합니다: 자원을 3개 획득합니다.

back_text: Each investigator immediately takes 3 horror. Then, proceed to (→R4).
name: 야수가 풀려나다
text: Forced - When this agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold: Instead, remove all doom in play and move The Experiment 1 location toward the Dormitories. Objective - If The Experiment enters the Dormitories, advance.

name: 오른 도서관
text: You must spend 1 additional action to investigate the Orne Library.

name: 실험체
text: Massive. The Experiment gets +3[per_investigator] health. Forced - When the enemy phase begins: Ready The Experiment. Objective - If The Experiment is defeated, advance to act 3b.

name: 워렌 라이스 교수
text:
당신은 +1 [intellect]을 얻습니다.
[reaction] 당신이 위치한 장소에서 당신이 마지막으로 남은 단서를 발견한 후, ‘워렌 라이스 교수’를 소진합니다: 카드를 1장 뽑습니다.

back_text:
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
If the players have completed Extracurricular Activity, advance directly to agenda 2b. If The House Always Wins is the first scenario in the campaign, advance to agenda 2a.
name: 클로버 클럽
text:
Each [[Criminal]] enemy gains Aloof.
If an investigator deals damage to a [[Criminal]] enemy: Immediately advance.

back_text:
Put the set-aside Darkened Hall into play.
If it is Agenda 1, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Criminal]] enemy is discarded, and spawn that enemy in the Darkened Hall.
name: 초심자의 행운
text: [reaction] When you reveal a chaos token: You may treat that token as if it were any other token in the chaos bag. If you do, remember that you have "cheated." (Group limit once per round.) Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance.

name: 클로버 클럽 카드게임방
text:
While it is Act 1, Clover Club Cardroom gains:
"[action] Spend 2 resources: Reveal a random chaos token.
If it is a [elder_sign] symbol, gain 2 clues and 2 resources from the token bank.
If it is an even number, gain 2 clues from the token bank.
If it is an odd number or a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, nothing happens."

name: 뒷골목
text: [action]: Resign. We can get out this way!

name: 클로버 클럽 책임자
text: Prey - Highest [intellect]. Hunter. Forced - After an investigator at Clover Club Pit Boss's location gains any number of clues: Clover Club Pit Boss readies, engages that investigator, and makes an immediate attack.

name: 피터 클로버
text: Forced - At the start of the enemy phase, if no investigator controls Peter Clover: Deal 1 damage to him. [free]Exhaust Peter Clover: Automatically evade a [[Criminal]] enemy in your location.

name: 프랜시스 모건 박사
text:
당신은 +1 [combat]을 얻습니다.
[reaction] 당신이 적 하나를 쓰러뜨린 후, ‘프랜시스 모건 박사’를 소진합니다: 카드를 1장 뽑습니다.

name: 아포고몬의 빛
text: Peril. Revelation - You must attach Light of Aforgomon to either the current agenda or the current act. Limit 1 per agenda/act. Treat all damage as direct damage and all horror as direct horror.

name: 부정한 땅
text: Revelation - Put Unhallowed Country into play in your threat area. You cannot play [[Ally]] assets. Treat the printed text box of each [[Ally]] asset you control as if it were blank. Forced - At the end of your turn: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Unhallowed Country.

name: 뒤틀린 운명
text: Revelation - Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [elder_sign] symbol or positive number, nothing happens. If you reveal any other number, take 1 damage. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, take 2 horror.

name: 저 너머의 공포
text: Peril. Revelation - Choose one of the following cardtypes (asset, event, or skill). Each player must discard each card in his or her hand that is of the chosen cardtype. If this is not the first copy of Terror from Beyond drawn this phase, choose two cardtypes instead.

name: 불가사의한 장벽
text: Revelation - Attach to your location. As an additional cost to move into or out of attached location, test [willpower] (4). If successful, discard Arcane Barrier. Otherwise, you must either cancel the effects of the move or discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

name: 구체 복합물 덩어리
text: Prey - Lowest [willpower]. Hunter. Forced - After you perform an attack against the Conglomeration of Spheres using a [[Melee]] card: Discard that card.

name: 잠복자의 하인
text: Prey - Lowest [agility]. Hunter. Forced - When Servant of the Lurker attacks you: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: 플레이 상태인 [[초차원]] 장소마다 -1.
[cultist]: 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 이번 능력 테스트가 끝난 후, 장소 하나를 버릴 때까지 조우 덱 맨 윗장부터 카드를 한 장씩 버립니다. 이렇게 버려진 장소를 플레이 영역에 두고 그 장소로 이동합니다.
[tablet]: -5. ‘요그 소토스’가 플레이 상태라면, 이번 능력 테스트가 끝난 후 ‘요그 소토스’가 당신을 공격합니다.
[elder_thing]: -X. 당신이 위치한 장소의 장막값에 2를 곱한 수치가 X 값입니다. 당신이 위치한 장소가 [[초차원]]일 때 실패했다면, 그 장소를 버립니다.
name: 시공간을 헤매다
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: 플레이 상태인 [[초차원]] 장소마다 -1(최대 -5).
[cultist]: 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 실패하면, 이번 능력 테스트가 끝난 후, 장소 하나를 버릴 때까지 조우 덱 맨 윗장부터 카드를 한 장씩 버립니다. 이렇게 버려진 장소를 플레이 영역에 두고 그 장소로 이동합니다.
[tablet]: -3. ‘요그 소토스’가 플레이 상태라면, 이번 능력 테스트가 끝난 후 ‘요그 소토스’가 당신을 공격합니다.
[elder_thing]: -X. 당신이 위치한 장소의 장막값이 X 값입니다. 당신이 위치한 장소가 [[초차원]]일 때 실패했다면, 그 장소를 버립니다.

back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Then, discard cards from the top until a location is discarded. The lead investigator resolves that location's 'revelation' effect. Check Campaign Log. If the investigators failed to save the students, read the following: "A huge canine creature, alien to your eyes and yet familiar, appears before you. The creature rushes forward, and you prepare to fend it off, but to your surprise it runs through you, towards a building that wasn't behind you moments before: Derby Hall from the Miskatonic University. The creature bursts through the building's front door and you hear screams of panic from inside, followed by the crunch of snapping bones and cries of pain." Each investigator takes 1 horror, regardless of their location.
name: 모든 것이 하나다
text: Forced - After you are moved to a location by an encounter card effect: Take 1 horror.

back_text: In player order, Yog-Sothoth attacks each investigator in play, regardless of Yog-Sothoth's current location. Then, flip this agenda back to its "a" side.
name: 만물의 종말
text: Forced - After you are moved by an encounter card effect: Take 1 horror. Forced - If Yog-Sothoth is defeated, (→R3).

name: 성간 여행자
text: Spawn - Any [[Extradimensional]] location. Hunter. Forced - When Interstellar Traveler enters a location: Flip 1 clue on that location to its doom side and place it on Interstellar Traveler, or place 1 doom on Interstellar Traveler if there are no clues on that location.

back_text:
The investigator entering the Engine Car reads the following (out loud):
A tender car filled with coal blocks your way to the engine cab. Swallowing your fear, you climb out of the nearby window and clamber onto the roof of the train, making your way across the tender car. The steady backward motion of the train makes it difficult for you to keep your footing. As you get close, a winged creature swoops down from above, its body composed of piping hot steam.
You must decide (choose one): - Test [agility] (3) to attempt to dodge the creature. If you fail, you leap too far and barely grip the side of the train, hanging on for dear life. Although you manage to pull yourself up, the experience is terrifying. You suffer 1 mental trauma. - Test [combat] (3) to attempt to endure the creature's extreme heat. If you fail, the creature flies through you and the heat burns you. You suffer 1 physical trauma.
name: 뛰어!
text: Objective - If an investigator enters the Engine Car, immediately advance.

back_text:
Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.
You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.
name: 객실칸
text: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard cards from your hand with at least 2 total [agility] icons or take 2 damage.

back_text:
Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.
You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.
name: 객실칸
text: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard cards from your hand with at least 2 total [combat] icons or take 2 damage.

back_text:
Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.
You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.
name: 객실칸
text: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard cards from your hand with at least 2 total [willpower] icons or take 2 horror.

back_text:
Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.
You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.
name: 객실칸
text: Passenger Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you enter Passenger Car: You must either discard cards from your hand with at least 2 total [intellect] icons or take 2 horror.

back_text:
Train Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it.
You cannot enter Train Car unless all of the clues on the location to its left have been discovered.
name: 식당칸
text: Dining Car is connected to the locations to the left and right of it. Forced - After you reveal Dining Car: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Grappling Horror and draw it.

name: 무력한 승객
text: Surge. Revelation - Put Helpless Passenger into play at the location to your left (or at your location if you cannot). [action] Parley. Take control of Helpless Passenger. Forced - If Helpless Passenger leaves play: Each investigator takes 1 horror.

back_text:
If Hunting Horror is in play, add 1 doom to it.
If Hunting Horror is not in play, search the encounter deck, discard pile, and the void for Hunting Horror and spawn it in Museum Halls, if able. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
name: 접근 제한 구역
text: Forced - When Hunting Horror enters play: Attach the set-aside copy of Shadow-spawned to it, or add 1 resource to Shadow-spawned if it is already attached.

back_text:
If Hunting Horror is in play, add 1 doom to it.
If Hunting Horror is not in play, search the encounter deck, discard pile, and the void for Hunting Horror and spawn it in Museum Halls, if able. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
name: 그림자가 짙어지다
text: Forced - When Hunting Horror enters play: Attach the set-aside copy of Shadow-spawned to it, or add 1 resource to Shadow-spawned if it is already attached.

name: 관리실
text: You cannot investigate Administration Office while you have 4 or fewer resources.

name: 관리실
text: You cannot investigate Administration Office while you have 4 or fewer cards in your hand.

name: 애덤 린치
text: While you control Adam Lynch, treat the "[action] [action]" ability on the Security Office as if it were an "[action]" ability. Forced - When Adam Lynch leaves play: Remove him from the game and add 1 [tablet] token to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.

name: 네크로노미콘
text:
당신은 +1 [intellect]을 얻습니다.
[action]: 자원을 2개 획득합니다.

name: 공포의 추격자
text: Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - At the start of the enemy phase: Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If the revealed token has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, ready Hunting Horror. Forced - When Hunting Horror leaves play, place it in the void.

name: 의미 없는 전시물
text: Revelation - Test [intellect] (3). If you fail, lose 1 action for each point you failed by.

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: 플레이 상태인 ‘요그 소토스의 새끼’마다 -2.
[cultist]: 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 실패하면, 공포 1과 피해 1을 받습니다.
[tablet]: 0. 플레이 상태인 ‘요그 소토스의 새끼’ 하나에 놓인 단서를 모두 제거하거나, 또는 이 테스트에 자동으로 실패해야 합니다.
[elder_thing]: -5. 이 토큰이 ‘요그 소토스의 새끼’에 대해 공격 또는 회피를 시도하는 동안 공개되었다면, 해당 적은 즉시 당신을 공격합니다.
name: 차원 너머의 보이지 않는 존재
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: 플레이 상태인 ‘요그 소토스의 새끼’마다 -1.
[cultist]: 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 실패하면, 공포를 1 받습니다.
[tablet]: 0. 플레이 상태인 ‘요그 소토스의 새끼’ 하나에 놓인 단서를 모두 제거하거나, 또는 이 토큰의 보정값을 0 대신 -4로 해야 합니다.
[elder_thing]: -3. 이 토큰이 ‘요그 소토스의 새끼’에 대해 공격 또는 회피를 시도하는 동안 공개되었다면, 해당 적은 즉시 당신을 공격합니다.

back_text:
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
Spawn 1 of the set-aside Brood of Yog-Sothoth enemies at a random location, if able.
name: 날뛰는 괴물
text: Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Move each Brood of Yog-Sothoth enemy once toward a random location.

back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If there is a set-aside Brood of Yog-Sothoth, the lead investigator reads the following (out loud): Bleak storm clouds churn overhead and a blanket of rain pelts the countryside. As the downpour grows in intensity, you take refuge in a half-ruined shack nearby. There is a flash of lightning, and in the brief illumination, you spot the outline of something large in the rain. Without warning, the distant trees bend, though nothing seems to be bending them. Moments later, a force with the strength of a truck crashes into your refuge. Spawn 1 of the set-aside Brood of Yog-Sothoth enemies at the lead investigator's location, if able. Then, each investigator at that location tests [agility] (4). The newly spawned Brood of Yog-Sothoth makes an attack against each investigator who fails this skill test.
name: 때를 기다리다
text: Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Move each Brood of Yog-Sothoth enemy once toward a random location.

name: 요그 소토스의 새끼
text:
Massive.
Brood of Yog-Sothoth gets +1[per_investigator] health and cannot be damaged or attacked except using the ability on Esoteric Formula.

name: 언덕 아랫자락
text: Base of the Hill is connected to each copy of Diverging Path. [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, put a random set-aside Diverging Path into play. (Limit once per round.) [action]: Resign. "This is more than I signed up for!"

back_text: The path leading further up the hill is masked. You cannot move into Ascending Path.
name: 경사로
text: Ascending Path is connected to each copy of Altered Path. [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, put a random set-aside Altered Path into play. (Limit once per round.)

name: 파괴된 길
text: Forced - After you reveal Destroyed Path: Place 1[per_investigator] doom on it. [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, remove 1 doom from Destroyed Path.

name: 광분한 쇼고스
text: Spawn - Nearest [[Altered]] location. Forced - When Crazed Shoggoth attacks: If this attack would defeat an investigator, that investigator is instead killed.

back_text: Check Campaign Log. - If you intruded on a secret meeting, proceed to (→R2). - Otherwise, proceed to (→R1).
name: 뒤쫓아오는 그림자
text: [free] Spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Either place 1 doom on the current agenda, or automatically evade The Organist. (Group limit once per round.) Objective - Survive three nights. (Do not advance until you are instructed.)

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: -X. X는 플레이 상태인 모든 주요사건에 놓인 파멸 개수의 총합입니다.
[cultist]:  다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 당신이 위치한 장소에 파멸이 1개 이상 놓인 적이 있다면, 혼돈 토큰을 더 공개하지 않고, 그 대신 이번 능력 테스트에 자동으로 실패합니다.
[tablet]: 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 당신이 ‘난이도를 넘어선 차이 1 이상으로 성공’하지 못하면, 모든 주요사건에 파멸을 1개씩 올려놓습니다.
[elder_thing]: -3. 실패하면, 조우 덱과 버린 조우 카드 더미에서 [[비야키]] 적 하나를 찾아서 뽑습니다.
name: 검은 별이 떠오르다
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: -X. X는 플레이 상태인 주요사건들 중에서, 파멸이 가장 많이 놓인 주요사건의 파멸 개수입니다.
[cultist]: 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 파멸이 1개 이상 놓인 적을 상대로 한 공격 또는 회피 시도 중에 이 토큰을 공개했다면, 혼돈 토큰을 더 공개하지 않고, 그 대신 이번 능력 테스트에 자동으로 실패합니다.
[tablet]: 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 실패하면, 모든 주요사건에 파멸을 1개씩 올려놓습니다.
[elder_thing]: -2. 실패하면, 조우 덱과 버린 조우 카드 더미에서 [[비야키]] 적 하나를 찾아서 뽑습니다.

name: 꼭두각시로 전락하다
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Traitorous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. You may commit this card to a skill test at your location. That test automatically fails.

back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
name: 진실은 숨겨져 있다
text: Do not add doom to this agenda during the Mythos phase. Forced - After 1 or more clues are placed on an enemy in play: Flip those clues to their doom side.

back_text: Forced - When an enemy spawns at this location: Reveal this location.
name: 아컴 사학회
text: While investigating this location, your [intellect] cannot be modified.

back_text: Forced - When an enemy spawns at this location: Reveal this location.
name: 아컴 사학회
text: While investigating this location, your [intellect] cannot be modified.

back_text: While an enemy is moving, Hidden Library gains the [[Passageway]] trait.
name: 비밀 서재
text: While an enemy is moving, Hidden Library gains the [[Passageway]] trait.

name: 피버디 씨
text: [action] Exhaust Mr. Peabody: Choose a location. Until Mr. Peabody readies, that location gets -1 shroud and gains the [[Passageway]] trait.

name: 다이안 드바인
text: Aloof. Each investigator at Dianne Devine's location cannot discover or take control of clues. Forced - At the beginning of the enemy phase: Find the [[Bystander]] asset with the fewest clues on it. Move Dianne Devine to that asset's location, if able.

name: 폴터가이스트
text: Cannot be damaged except by [[Spell]], [[Relic]], or encounter cards. [action] Parley. Test [intellect] (3) to attempt to banish the geist. If you succeed, deal it 1 damage.

name: 표식을 목도한 자
text: Forced - After Maniac engages you: Take 1 damage and deal 1 damage to Maniac.

name: 황색의 왕의 춤
text: Revelation - If there are no [[Possessed]] enemies in play, Dance of the Yellow King gains surge. Otherwise, test [willpower] (3). If you fail, the nearest [[Possessed]] enemy readies, moves (one location at a time) until it reaches your location, engages you, and makes an immediate attack.

name: 부식
text: Revelation - Discard [[Item]] assets from play and/or from your hand with a total printed resource cost of at least X, where X is the shroud value of your location. If no cards are discarded by this effect, Corrosion gains surge.

name: 시체를 파먹는 괴수
text: Spawn - Discard a [[Humanoid]] enemy at any location and spawn Corpse Dweller at that location (if there are no [[Humanoid]] enemies in play, discard Corpse Dweller and it gains surge instead). Hunter. Retaliate.

name: 등 뒤의 그림자
text: Revelation - Put The Shadow Behind You into play in your threat area. Limit 1 per investigator. [action]: You look behind you. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you did not perform the above [action] ability: You must either discard all of your resources or discard all cards in your hand. Then, discard The Shadow Behind You.

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다. 실패하면, 치워 두었던 [[괴물]] 적 중에서 무작위로 1장을 선택하여 앞면을 보지 않고 주요목적 덱 밑에 놓습니다(테스트당 1번 한정).
[cultist]: -X. X는 당신이 가진 공포 개수입니다. 실패하면, 공포를 1 받습니다.
[tablet]: -X. X는 당신이 위치한 장소의 기본 장막값입니다. 실패하면, 공포를 1 받습니다.
[elder_thing]: 0. 둘 중 하나를 선택합니다. 치워 두었던 [[괴물]] 적 중에서 무작위로 1장을 선택하여 앞면을 보지 않고 주요목적 덱 밑에 놓습니다 (또는) 이번 능력 테스트에 자동으로 실패합니다.
name: 입에 담아선 안 될 맹세
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: -1. 실패하면, 치워 두었던 [[괴물]] 적 중에서 무작위로 1장을 선택하여 앞면을 보지 않고 주요목적 덱 밑에 놓습니다.
[cultist]: -X. X는 당신이 가진 공포 개수입니다.
[tablet]: -X. X는 당신이 위치한 장소의 기본 장막값입니다.
[elder_thing]: 0. 둘 중 하나를 선택합니다. 치워 두었던 [[괴물]] 적 중에서 무작위로 1장을 선택하여 앞면을 보지 않고 주요목적 덱 밑에 놓습니다 (또는) 이번 능력 테스트에 자동으로 실패합니다.

name: 정신병원 복도
text: [action] Take 1 horror: Evade. Automatically evade a [[Possessed]] enemy at this location.

back_text: The gate leading into the Garden is locked. You cannot enter the Garden.
name: 정원
text: [action] If there are no clues on Garden: Test [agility] (2). If you succeed, remember that you "distracted the guards."

name: 구속복
text: Revelation - If there is no copy of Straitjacket in your threat area, put Straitjacket into play in your threat area as an asset that takes up a body slot and 2 hand slots. Return each asset in those slots to your hand. This card cannot leave play except by the ability below. [action] [action]: Discard Straitjacket.

name: 광기의 선물
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Gift of Madness (Misery) to your hand. You cannot trigger [action] abilities on locations. [action]: Randomly choose 1 enemy from among the set-aside [[Monster]] enemies and place it beneath the act deck without looking at it. Discard Gift of Madness (Misery) from your hand.

back_text:
- Before creating the "Exhibit Deck," add the 2 new Exhibit Hall locations to the original 6 Exhibit Hall locations. Set Exhibit Hall (Restricted Hall) aside and randomly remove 2 Exhibit Hall locations from the game. Then, continue creating the Exhibit Deck as normal.
For the duration of this scenario, the following additional rule applies: "While an investigator is resolving the text on agenda 1b and agenda 2b, the Forced ability on the next agenda in the agenda deck is considered to be active." Attach this card to the scenario reference card as a reminder.
name: 돌아온 미스캐토닉 박물관
text: Perform the setup as indicated in The Dunwich Legacy Campaign Guide, with the following exceptions: - When gathering encounter sets, also gather the new encounter sets for Return to The Miskatonic Museum shown here. (Continued on reverse side.)

name: 어둠의 명령
text: Revelation - Attach Dark Bidding to Hunting Horror, even if it is out of play. Dark Bidding remains attached to Hunting Horror if it enters the void. Forced - When Hunting Horror attacks an investigator: That investigator must take 1 additional damage and 1 additional horror. Heal 2 damage from Hunting Horror. Discard Dark Bidding. (Max once per attack.)

back_text:
- Remove the original Study location from the game and replace it with the new Study (Aberrant Gateway). Put the Study (Aberrant Gateway) into play. Each investigator begins play in the Study (Aberrant Gateway).
- Put the new Guest Hall, Bedroom, and Bathroom locations into play.
- Remove the original Hallway location from the game.
- Choose one of the two Attic locations and one of the two Cellar locations at random, and set them aside, out of play. Remove the other versions of Attic and Cellar from the game.
- Set each other location aside, out of play.
name: 돌아온 회합
text:
Perform the setup as indicated in the Night of the Zealot Campaign Guide, with the following exceptions:
- When gathering encounter sets, also gather the new encounter sets for Return to The Gathering shown here.
- Remove Act 1a- "Trapped" from the game and replace it with the new Act 1a- "Mysterious Gateway."
(Continued on reverse side.)

name: 다이안 드바인
subname: 그대가 무슨 짓을 하려는 건지 다 알고 있어요
text: Prey - Most clues. Hunter. Dianne Devine gets +3[per_investigator] health. Forced - After any investigator performs a parley action: Move Dianne Devine once toward that investigator.

name: 망상 속의 악
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - You must either secretly add Delusory Evils to your hand, or place 1 doom on the current agenda and discard Delusory Evils (this effect may cause the current agenda to advance). Forced - When you would succeed at a skill test by 3 or more: You automatically fail, instead. Discard Delusory Evils from your hand.

back_text: Flooded Square is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
name: Flooded Square
text:
Flooded Square is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
[action]: Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at the location in the counter-clockwise direction. (Group limit once per turn.)

name: Gilded Volto
text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] in play.
[reaction] After Gilded Volto enters play: Treat the next asset you play this turn as if it has fast.
[reaction] When you initiate a non-[agility] test, discard Gilded Volto: Use [agility] for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

name: Swamp Leech
text: Spawn - Any [[Bayou]] location. Swamp Leech cannot be evaded. Forced - When Swamp Leech enters a non-[[Bayou]] location: Discard it.

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: -X. X는 플레이 상태인 [[손님]] 적의 수입니다.
[cultist]: -2. 승점 더미에 [[무고한]] 적이 있다면, 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다.
[tablet]: -5. 대신 -2로 간주하기 위해, 당신이 가진 단서 1개를 당신이 위치한 장소에 올려놓아도 됩니다.
[elder_thing]: -3. 이번 테스트에 실패하면, 승점 더미에 있는 [[무고한]] 적마다 공포를 1씩 받습니다.
name: 엑셀시어 호텔 살인사건
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: -X. X는 플레이 상태인 [[손님]] 적의 수입니다.
[cultist]: -1. 승점 더미에 [[무고한]] 적이 있다면, 다른 혼돈 토큰을 하나 더 공개합니다.
[tablet]: -3. 대신 -1로 간주하기 위해, 당신이 가진 단서 1개를 당신이 위치한 장소에 올려놓아도 됩니다.
[elder_thing]: -3. 이번 테스트에 실패했고 승점 더미에 [[무고한]] 적이 있다면, 공포를 1 받습니다.

name: 무념무상의 무희
text: Spawn - Farthest empty space. Hunter. Mindless Dancer can enter empty space as if it were a location. Forced - After Mindless Dancer moves to an empty space via its hunter keyword: Resolve its hunter keyword again. (Limit once per round.)

name: 암운이 드리운 세계
text: Revelation - If there is no doom on Azathoth, A World in Darkness gains surge. Otherwise, for each doom on Azathoth, you must choose one: - Lose 1 resource. - Choose and discard 1 card from your hand. - Take 1 horror. - Take 1 damage.

name: 태고의 차원문
text: Revelation - Attach to a random location. Place breaches on attached location until there are exactly 3 breaches on it. Treat the attached location as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]). [action]: Test [intellect] or [willpower] (4) to close the gateway. If you succeed, discard Primordial Gateway.

name: 감시자의 손아귀
text: Revelation - Heal 3 damage from The Spectral Watcher. Ready The Spectral Watcher. It moves, engages, and attacks as if it were the enemy phase. Throughout the resolution of this effect, The Spectral Watcher gains "Prey - You."

name: 황폐화
text: Revelation - Put Wracked into play in your threat area. You get -1 to each of your skills during the first skill test you perform each round. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Wracked. If there is an exhausted [[Witch]] enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

name: 별들에 이끌리다
text: Revelation - Put Pulled by the Stars into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you did not move at least once during your turn: Take 2 horror. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Pulled by the Stars from play. If there is an exhausted [[Witch]] enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

name: 징벌
text: Revelation - Put Punishment into play in your threat area. Forced - After an enemy at any location is defeated: Take 1 damage. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Punishment. If there is an exhausted [[Witch]] enemy at your location, this test is automatically successful.

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: -2 (당신이 [[동굴]] 장소에 있다면, -2 대신 -4).
[cultist]: -3. 실패하면, 당신이 위치한 장소에 파멸을 1개 올려놓습니다.
[tablet]: -3. 당신이 중독되어 있다면, -3 대신 이번 능력 테스트가 자동 실패합니다. 당신이 중독되어 있지 않았고 이번 능력 테스트에 실패했다면, 치워 두었던 ‘중독’ 약점 하나를 가져와 플레이 영역 중 당신의 위협 영역에 둡니다.
[elder_thing]: -4. 실패하면, 공포를 1 받습니다.
name: 고대 문명의 심장부
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: -1 (당신이 [[동굴]] 장소에 있다면, -1 대신 -3).
[cultist]: -2. 실패하면, 당신이 위치한 장소에 파멸을 1개 올려놓습니다.
[tablet]: -2. 당신이 중독되어 있다면, -2 대신 이번 능력 테스트가 자동 실패합니다.
[elder_thing]: -3. 실패하면, 공포를 1 받습니다.

back_text:
Find each [[Tenochtitlán]] location in play with no clues on it. Add those locations to the victory display. Then, for each [[Present-Day]] location in play, search the exploration deck for a location with a matching location symbol in the upper-left corner and place it on top of that location, taking its place.
Each investigator loses each of his or her clues.
Spawn the set-aside Padma Amrita enemy in Templo Mayor.
Remove the current act deck from the game. Put the set-aside act 3a and agenda 3a into play as the current act and agenda.
name: 방벽이 얇아졌다

back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: -2 (당신의 손에 카드가 5장 이상 있다면, -2 대신 자동 실패합니다).
[cultist] 또는 [elder_thing]: -2. 당신이 위치한 장소에 당신이 가진 단서를 1개 올려놓습니다.
[tablet]: -3. 실패하면, 능력값이 난이도에 모자란 차이마다, 당신의 손에서 무작위로 카드를 1장씩 버립니다.
name: 기록물의 도시
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: -1 (당신의 손에 카드가 5장 이상 있다면, -1 대신 -3).

[tablet]: -3. 실패하면, 당신의 손에서 무작위로 카드를 1장 버립니다.

[skull]: -X. X는 승점 더미의 복수 점수에 1을 더한 값입니다.
[cultist]: -X. X는 플레이 상태인 장소 개수입니다.
[tablet]: -X. X는 탐사 덱에 있는 카드 장수입니다(최소 3).

name: 길들지 않은 야생
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: -X. X는 승점 더미의 복수 점수입니다.
[cultist]: -X. X는 플레이 상태인 장소 개수입니다(최대 5).
[tablet]: -X. X는 탐사 덱에 있는 카드 장수입니다(최대 5).
[elder_thing]: -2. 당신이 중독되어 있다면, -2 대신 이번 능력 테스트가 자동 실패합니다.

name: 발루시아의 선봉장
text: Alert. Hunter. Retaliate. Harbinger of Valusia can retaliate while exhausted. Forced - After Harbinger of Valusia is successfully attacked or evaded: Place 1 resource on it. Then, if there are 2[per_investigator] resources on it, it vanishes with a sinister hiss. (Set it aside, out of play. It keeps all damage tokens.)

name: 에스틀리 파수꾼
text: Spawn - Any empty location ([[Ancient]], if able). Alert. Aloof. Forced - When enemies attack during the enemy phase, if Eztli Guardian is ready and unengaged: It attacks each investigator in each connecting location.

name: 생매장
text: Revelation - Put Entombed into play in your threat area. You cannot disengage from enemies or move. [action]: Test [agility] (4) to escape the tomb or [combat] (4) to break out. If you succeed, discard Entombed. If you fail, reduce the difficulty of this test by 1 until the end of the round.

name: 뱀의 재앙
text: Revelation - Put Snakescourge into play in your threat area. If you are poisoned, Snakescourge gains surge. Treat each of your non-weakness [[Item]] assets as if its text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]). Forced - At the end of the round: Discard Snakescourge.
